page.title: 17SEWAGE WORKS
page.content: EMPLOYMENT. SEWERAGE WORKS. Serves Pocklington, Barmby Moor, Allerthorpe, & Millington, population combined 5,770, (Capacity No.6,377). A combined system with storm-water overflow into Pocklington Beck. Works- Inlet works with Simplex Shallowmatic automatic screen. Storm overflow weir to storm tanks radial & rectangular, and grit channels. Screw pumps take the water to higher level Primary Settlement Tanks, radial & upward flow. The filter beds are circular.Humas tanks have radial & upward flow.Recirculation wet well. Sludge holding tanks. Screenings stockpiled, tanks desluged daily. Sludge disposal by liquid tanker direct to land. The re-circulated water is discharged into the River Derwent. The domestic water for this area comes from springs & bore-holes.
